channel.title: What is the equivalent of "GND" in the patcher?
channel.description:
I recon'ed that in my current axoloti project, I am more than happy with only one input and one output. To minimize stage-clutter I thought of making the output therefore a specific _unbalanced Mono-jack_. Hence the question: Is it possible to feed the right out (Ring contact) a constant GND-equivalent level and, if so, how?
Just for the records: A _balanced mono output_ can be achieved by phase-inverting the output signal of the right channel.

item.title: What is the equivalent of "GND" in the patcher?
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Just do not output anything on the right channel.

And effectively outputting the same signal but inverted on the right channel, results in a balanced output.

Read full topic
item.source: What is the equivalent of "GND" in the patcher?
